import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react' import { PhotoIcon, UserCircleIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/solid' import dayjs from "dayjs"; import {useNavigate} from "react-router-dom"; import {addUserEvent} from "../../../api/user"; import axios from "axios"; export const AddEventForm = ({setOpen, formType, event}) => { const now = dayjs().format('YYYY-MM-DD') const [name, setName] = useState('') const [location, setLocation] = useState('') const [date, setDate] = useState('') const [time, setTime] = useState('') const [description, setDescription] = useState('') const navigate = useNavigate() //console.log("form",event) useEffect(()=>{ if(formType === false){ setName(event.name) setLocation(event.location) setDate(event.date.slice(0,10)) setTime(event.date.slice(11,16)) console.log(time) setDescription(event.description) } },[]) const handleSubmit = async (e) =>{ e.preventDefault() if(formType){ console.log("started") await axios.post('/api/user/add-event',{name, location, date, description}) .then() .catch(error=>{ console.log(error) }) }else{ await axios.patch('/api/user/edit-event',{id: event._id, name, location, date, description}) .then(res=>{ console.log(res.data) }) .catch(error=>{ console.log(error) }) } } const handleDelete = async (e)=>{ e.preventDefault() await axios.delete('/api/user/delete-event',{id: event._id}) .then(res=>{ console.log(res) }) .catch(error=>{ console.log(error) }) } return (

{formType ? ( 'Add' ) : ( 'Edit' )} Event

General information

{!formType &&
}
setName(e.target.value)} type="text" name="name" id="name" autoComplete="name" className="block flex-1 border-0 bg-transparent py-1.5 pl-1 text-gray-900 placeholder:text-gray-400 focus:ring-0 sm:text-sm sm:leading-6" value={name} />
setLocation(e.target.value)} type="text" name="location" id="location" autoComplete="name" className="block flex-1 border-0 bg-transparent py-1.5 pl-1 text-gray-900 placeholder:text-gray-400 focus:ring-0 sm:text-sm sm:leading-6" value={location} />
setDate(e.target.value)} type="date" name="date" id="date" autoComplete="date" className="block flex-1 border-0 bg-transparent py-1.5 pl-1 text-gray-900 placeholder:text-gray-400 focus:ring-0 sm:text-sm sm:leading-6" value={date} />
setTime(e.target.value)} type="time" name="time" id="time" autoComplete="time" className="block flex-1 border-0 bg-transparent py-1.5 pl-1 text-gray-900 placeholder:text-gray-400 focus:ring-0 sm:text-sm sm:leading-6" value={time} />
